name: Where am I?! (dutch)
description:
In Where am I?! you play as Mira's friend . Mira suffers from social anxiety  and  can't handle busy places well. You as Mira's friend need to help her go through the day and maybe learn a little something about how to help someone with anxiety.

This game is a demo prototype. If a full game comes out in the future it could be very different. 

As of now the game is only playable in dutch. A english version will come later.
